relation: Pinch-Hitter Mark Kotsay singled to center. Runner on first with none out and Mark Teahen due up.
Mark Teahen triple to right scored Omar Vizquel with none out. Runner on third and Juan Pierre due up.
Juan Pierre was hit-by-pitch. Runners on first and third with none out and Gordon Beckham due up.
Gordon Beckham grounded out short to first. Runners on second and third with one out and Carlos Quentin due up.
Carlos Quentin grounded into a fielder's choice, third to catcher. Runners on first and third with two outs and Paul Konerko due up.
Paul Konerko grounded out pitcher to first to end the inning.
